overview: Take a journey with us to discover who we are, where we are, why we are here, and where we are going. Learn about ages, races, civilizations, states of consciousness and more. The cosmic egg and calendar explains all 5 epoch cycles, and makes a bold prediction for the year 2020.
tagline: The Most Interesting Video On Earth. (Q)onstruct Of Reality?
title: UNIversal DISClosure 2020
